page.title: 11Two Small Schools
page.content:
In our area there are only 2 small schools.There used to be 3 but the Primary school in Smisby had to close down because there weren't enough children between 5 and 11 to keep it open.
In Hartshorne there is a small Primary school.The children are aged 5-11 some of them have to go a long way to school especially the children who live in the farms.When the children are 11 they have to go to Granville school in Woodville which is 3 miles away.In Blackfordby school the children are aged 5-8.When they are 8 they move to Woodville Junior school, 3 miles away.The children have to go by bus. There are no secondary schools in our area.There is a play group at Blackfo- rdby for children under 5.
